JAC III Ltd. Information Request

Pursuant to the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act of Japan, JAC III Ltd., who filed a notification for Specially Permitted Businesses for Qualified Institutional Investors, Etc., is required to make available to the public certain information. If you would like to obtain such information, please make a request via email to fundops@japanactivationcapital.com with your name, company name, position and email address, and such information will be sent to you via email promptly after your request.
